subTitle: The most common questions of our Prospective Client

faqs.question: How do you choose your client?
faqs.answer:
“Those who lack courage, will always find a way a philosophy to justify it. - Albert Camus”

There is only one criterion, I use to assess my prospective client with. I ask myself following question:
Does my prospective client, really want to make a change in their life or do they keep finding reasons for not trying something new? 

Do they believe in the sacredness of their own being, and are willing to do the work? Or are they hoping, that I will give them a magic pill or exercise, psychedelics or tantra, that will solve their issues?  

My work is all about active engagement, and personal involvement, and if my prospective client would keep finding reason or philosophy to not do the work, that client is not for me. They should keep doing what they are doing, keep looking further for the next dopamine hit.

faqs.question: What does our first session look like?
faqs.answer:
This session is about giving you a peak into my framework, and establishing a common ground on the outlook of life with my client.

 I believe all the interactions should flow naturally, and there is no driving necessity to perform or convince. Best work happens naturally in a goal-less setup.

faqs.question: How much do you charge for your first session?
faqs.answer: Our first session is completely free of charge, and do not incur any hidden costs.

faqs.question: Which languages do you provide the coaching in?
faqs.answer:
1. In the Western hemisphere of Earth, I am fluent in German, English, and Spanish, so I consult my clients in these languages.

2. In Indian subcontinent, I speak Hindi and English

faqs.question: What is your Inner Circle about?
faqs.answer:
My inner circle is a network of like-minded individuals who share a common interest in designing an architecture of life on earth with a single aim. 

 The Profoundness of life to be experienced by every living being on earth in a goal-less setup.

faqs.question: Why did you choose this life path?
faqs.answer:
Life guides have always been present in all older cultures. Some one who had deeper understanding of how different components of life are interconnected and feed into each other.

 I had this curious inclination right from when I was young, and it has always been my dream to be able to put this into a framework, so humans can heighten their level of awareness in life.
